summary: Mephistopheles, often called Mephisto, is a well-known demon from German folklore. He first appeared in a famous story called the Faust legend. In this tale, Mephistopheles makes a deal with a man named Faust. Since then, he has shown up in many other stories, art, and popular culture. People often picture him flying over the town of Wittenberg, as shown in a lithograph by Eug√®ne Delacroix.
title: Mephistopheles
